foods.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
foods.instructions: Mix eggs, pancetta, pecorino cheese, and black pepper. Toss with cooked spaghetti.
foods.author: Antony

foods.name: Margherita Pizza
foods.instructions: Spread tomato sauce on dough, add mozzarella cheese and basil leaves. Bake until crust is golden brown.
foods.author: Pizza Chef Luigi

foods.name: Caesar Salad
foods.instructions: Toss lettuce, croutons, and parmesan cheese with Caesar dressing. Serve chilled.
foods.author: Lisa

foods.name: Chicken Alfredo
foods.instructions: Cook chicken and pasta separately. In a saucepan, melt butter, add cream and cheese, then combine with pasta and chicken.
foods.author: Maria

foods.name: Chocolate Cake
foods.instructions: Mix dry ingredients, add eggs, butter, and milk. Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.
foods.author: Antony

foods.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
foods.instructions: Stir-fry chicken and vegetables with garlic and ginger. Add soy sauce for flavor.
foods.author: Emily

foods.name: Tomato Basil Soup
foods.instructions: Cook tomatoes, onion, garlic, and basil in vegetable broth. Blend and add heavy cream.
foods.author: Sarah

foods.name: Guacamole
foods.instructions: Mash avocado and mix with lime juice, tomato, onion, cilantro, and garlic. Serve with tortilla chips.
foods.author: Carlos

foods.name: Greek Salad
foods.instructions: Combine cucumber, tomato, red onion, feta cheese, olives, and oregano. Drizzle with olive oil.
foods.author: Maria

foods.name: Sushi Rolls
foods.instructions: Prepare sushi rice, lay out nori seaweed, add avocado, cucumber, and fish. Roll and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.
foods.author: Sushi Chef Hiroshi

foods.name: Baked Salmon
foods.instructions: Season salmon with lemon, dill, garlic, and olive oil. Bake until fish flakes easily.
foods.author: Michael

foods.name: Vegetable Curry
foods.instructions: Simmer vegetables in coconut milk and curry paste. Serve with rice.
foods.author: Sofia

foods.name: Pancakes
foods.instructions: Mix flour, milk, eggs, sugar, and baking powder. Cook on a griddle until golden brown.
foods.author: Antony

foods.name: Caprese Salad
foods.instructions: Layer tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil leaves. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil.
foods.author: Luca

foods.name: Chicken Tacos
foods.instructions: Cook chicken, fill tortillas with chicken, salsa, lettuce, cheese, and sour cream.
foods.author: Javier

foods.name: Mango Smoothie
foods.instructions: Blend mango, yogurt, honey, and milk until smooth. Enjoy as a refreshing smoothie.
foods.author: Linda

foods.name: Eggplant Parmesan
foods.instructions: Layer eggplant with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and parmesan cheese. Bake until bubbly and golden.
foods.author: Marco

foods.name: Tiramisu
foods.instructions: Dip ladyfingers in coffee, layer with mascarpone cheese mixture, and dust with cocoa powder. Chill before serving.
foods.author: Sofia

foods.name: Chili Con Carne
foods.instructions: Brown beef, add beans, tomato sauce, chili powder, onion, and bell peppers. Simmer until flavors meld.
foods.author: Carlos

foods.name: Chicken Curry
foods.instructions: Cook chicken with coconut milk, curry powder, onion, garlic, and ginger. Serve with rice.
foods.author: Priya
